segments.text: I can't help but stare at this unfolding kitchen drama.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in a view of the neat garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back, everything outside seems perfect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the woman's focused on her dish-drying task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got no idea the sink is overflowing behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading down, forming a nasty puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad to see potential harm ignored like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's adventure on the stool is thrilling but risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies, plate in hand, stool wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's cooperating, arm raised in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their secret snack time is kind of adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the anger builds seeing the negligence here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If only she'd turn around, everything could be fixed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene's a mix of joy and worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope it ends without any accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR
